Disease.Name: VITAMIN E DEFICIENCY (AVED)
Disease.Synonym: VITAMIN E, FAMILIAL ISOLATED DEFICIENCY OF
Disease.Summary: rare ;autosomal recessive ;mutation in the TTPA gene;there is evidence that this disorder results from mutation in the gene for alpha-tocopherol transfer protein (MIM 600415). familial vitamin E deficiency resembles Friedreichs ataxia vitamin E deficiency results also from lipid malabsorption syndromes, liver dysfunction, cholestasis, biliary atresia, pancreatic insufficiency, cystic fibrosis, abetalipoproteinemia
